SELECT org.*, CASE WHEN t.project_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t.project_count END AS projectCount, CASE WHEN f.user_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE f.user_count END AS userCount FROM hpfm_tenant org LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.organization_id AS org_id, COUNT(p.id) AS project_count FROM hpfm_tenant o JOIN fd_project p ON o.tenant_id = p.organization_id GROUP BY p.organization_id ) t ON org.tenant_id = t.org_id LEFT JOIN( SELECT imr.source_id AS source_id, COUNT(imr.member_id) AS user_count FROM iam_member_role imr WHERE imr.SOURCE_TYPE='organization' GROUP BY imr.source_id ) f ON org.tenant_id= f.source_id
AND org.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND org.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%',#{code}),'%')
AND org.enabled_flag = #{enabled}
AND ( org.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR org.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )

select distinct fo.* from hpfm_tenant fo inner join iam_member_role imr on (fo.tenant_id = imr.source_id and imr.source_type = 'organization') inner join iam_role ir on (ir.id = imr.role_id and ir.is_enabled = 1)
imr.member_id = #{memberId} and imr.member_type='user' and ir.code != 'role/organization/default/organization-member'
AND fo.is_enabled = 1

SELECT DISTINCT hpfm_tenant.* FROM hpfm_tenant WHERE id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT fp.organization_id FROM fd_project fp INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.source_id=fp.id INNER JOIN iam_role ON iam_role.is_enabled = 1 and iam_role.id = imr.role_id AND imr.source_type='project' WHERE imr.member_id=#{memberId} )
AND hpfm_tenant.is_enabled = 1

SELECT o.id, o.name, o.code, o.is_enabled, ir.id AS role_id, ir.name AS role_name, ir.code AS role_code, ir.is_enabled AS role_is_enabled FROM hpfm_tenant o INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT source_id FROM iam_member_role WHERE member_id = #{id} AND member_type = 'user' AND source_type = 'organization' ORDER BY source_id ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{size} ) t ON o.id = t.source_id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.source_id = o.id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id}
AND ( o.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR o.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )

SELECT o.id, o.name, o.code, o.is_enabled, ir.id AS role_id, ir.name AS role_name, ir.code AS role_code, ir.is_enabled AS role_is_enabled FROM hpfm_tenant o INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT source_id FROM iam_member_role WHERE member_id = #{id} AND member_type = 'user' AND source_type = 'organization' ORDER BY source_id ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{size} ) t ON o.id = t.source_id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.source_id = o.id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id}
AND ( o.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR o.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
SELECT is_enabled FROM hpfm_tenant WHERE id = #{sourceId}

SELECT fo.id, fo. NAME, fo. CODE, fo.is_enabled AS enabled, fo.category AS categoryCode, foc. NAME AS categoryName FROM hpfm_tenant fo LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_category foc ON fo.category = foc. CODE WHERE 1 = 1
AND fo.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND fo.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{code}), '%')
AND fo.is_enabled = #{enabled}
AND ( fo.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fo.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
AND fo.id IN
#{item}
SELECT fo.* FROM hpfm_tenant fo left join iam_user iu on fo.id = iu.organization_id where iu.id = #{userId}
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN fp.is_enabled=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS enableSum, SUM(CASE WHEN fp.is_enabled=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS stopSum FROM fd_project fp WHERE fp.organization_id=#{organizationId}

select fo.id from hpfm_tenant fo WHERE 1=1
AND fo.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')

SELECT ht.* FROM iam_member_role imr JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id JOIN hpfm_tenant ht ON ht.tenant_id = ir.h_tenant_id WHERE imr.member_id = #{userId} AND source_type = 'organization' AND ht.tenant_num = #{tenantNum} AND ir.CODE = 'role/organization/default/administrator' OR ir.CODE = 'administrator'
